Originally from Ankara, Turkey with the characteristic of long and soft hair
Is the result of a cross between an Asian Leopard Cat and a British domestic cat
It is said that originally a cat breed that used to accompany the monks who settled in temples in Burma
A long-haired cat with a round face and a snub nose. Originally from Iran then imported to Italy
A cat derived from the Wichian Maat (Thai cat) with a characteristic long and slender body, oval face, wide ears, and bluish eyes
"\"Russian domestic cat with thick fur and a large body but very agile and famous for its jumping ability \" "
"This horse is known as the pulling horse "
The Icelandic Horse is a breed of horse that was developed in Iceland. Although a small horse, sometimes the size of a horse, most registrants for Iceland refer to it as a horse
"\"This horse comes from Friesland in the Netherlands\" "

"The nile crocodile is one of the most dangerous crocodile species in the world. It can be found in lakes, fresh water or brackish water. The body size of the nile crocodile is also fairly large, it can reach 5-6 meters "

This crocodile with the Latin name Crocodylus porosus is not only vicious in preying but also becomes one of the largest reptiles in the world. Saltwater crocodiles can reach 6.5 - 7 meters in length and weigh up to 1,000 kg more
Although fairly dangerous, most alligators grow to a size smaller than a crocodile in general, which is about 4-4.5 meters
